topic.fullpath: Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: Message Boards

name: Samtal Discussion Board
short_description: Samtal is a small and easy discussion board. It supports user registration and so-called BB-Codes. To keep it small and fast there are no avatars and signatures to be set by the registrated users. Samtal is written in PHP with a mySQL backend.
